title: マイルCSの後に・嬉しみがエグい

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Aaaahhh! I lost! The frustration is brutal!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Actually, I've decided! I'm gonna spread my wings even more!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I'll master my explosive escapes, then we'll race again! Okay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course, I want to race with you again too!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hehe! Well, thanks for today, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aww~, I'm glad I got to run with Helios-san today!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Like in the paddock, you were so energetic in the gate and during the race too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It was like I was getting power from you. What an amazing Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'The Cheer Up Helios Festival (Snack Fest) is happening, but Tannhauser, you coming too!?'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, but I'm technically the one who won today...
It seems 'The Cheer Up Helios Festival' was fun, and the next day, Matikanetannhauser told me all about it.
